body:
Hey everyone! It's nice to be here again. I'm really bad with words so I'll explain as best as I can.

Who am I?
My name is ViolentBoo, I used to play on this server religiously every day for a few hours. But then I stopped because school was getting too intense, and I wasn't really interested in minecraft anymore. I started to get into League of Legends, and lets just say I got addicted way too quickly. I haven't had internet for about a month and a half and I was going to shoot someone LIKE BRO THERE WAS NOTHING TO DO-

What Happened?
Well you see my parents went to go to Iraq for about a month and that was in the middle of June, so I was forced to go live in my sisters house. Three months later they're still not back and I have never missed my parents so much. Sure they call everyday but with my lack of Arabic skills and the bad reception there, it just feels like a quick blur of their voice. Anyway, my sisters are niiice if I could say the least. I have a wire leading into the modem upstairs and they just remove it when they want me to do something and they don't care about the things that I like which is pretty much just video games, but I shouldn't bitch about it, they're keeping a roof over my head even thought there was a nice apartment just sitting there that I could just stay but nooooo my parents won't let me xd. The interet was cut off for about a month and a half and we just got it back and Jesus it's great. I wen't to the apartment one day with my computer for the whole day and I played eighteen matches of league back to back. My god.

Where do we stand now?
I'm going to make more videos again but it's going to be hard to make videos here because I can't be loud at times and I like to be loud in my videos so it's a challenge. You had no idea how fun it was to make videos back then.


I don't really know how to end these things, lets just say that I'm going to be playing again :D
Also I changed my skin to Xerath from lol.
